committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Federal Building in Utica, New York, as the "Alexander Pirnie Federal Building".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the U.S. Post Office and Courthouse in Utica, New York, as the Alexander Pirnie Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Federal Building in Utica, New York, as the "Alexander Pirnie Federal Building".
